chatTitle: Understand Code and Dependencies for Fixes

children.text: I going to provide you with some code i want you to simply say I understand while I send you more code an want you to Understand that the code i put below is is the main code that I want you to fix any problems for any I want you to use these other files I send after to make all the logic in the main file work don’t update or send me any code untill I confire you can i want to make sure that we can make everything in the main file whole before we print the full code to it.

assistantMessage.text: I understand. I'll wait for you to send me the main code and any additional files before I analyze and fix any problems. I won't update or send any code until you confirm that you want me to do so. Please go ahead and share the code with me.
